CREATE TABLE delivery_routes (
  route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  route_name VARCHAR(50),
  transport_mode VARCHAR(20),
  start_location VARCHAR(100),
  end_location VARCHAR(100),
  distance DECIMAL(10, 2),
  average_delivery_time TIME
);

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE DeliveryRoutes (
    route_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    route_name STRING,
    starting_location STRING,
    ending_location STRING,
    distance_km FLOAT,
    estimated_time_hours FLOAT
);


CREATE TABLE TransportTimes (
    transport_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    route_id UUID REFERENCES DeliveryRoutes(route_id),
    transport_type STRING,
    departure_time TIMESTAMP,
    arrival_time TIMESTAMP
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE DeliveryRoutes SET distance_km = 50 WHERE route_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
